title: My Google camera goes dark almost every time i open it.
content: My Google camera goes dark almost every time i open it. I've tried clearing cache, storage, rebooting the phone, reboot in safe mode. None of these work. I tried uninstalling the updates of the Camera app. When i open the app it works at the beginning but after opening it 2 - 3 times, it goes dark again. Can someone please help.
